com.amsterdam.marktbureau.makkelijkemarkt.data

Class MakkelijkeMarktProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amsterdam.marktbureau.makkelijkemarkt.data.MakkelijkeMarktProvider

  • public class MakkelijkeMarktProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Database provider for caching the content from the makkelijke markt api locally in an sqlite db
    Author:
    marcolangebeeke

      • insert

        public Uri insert(Uri uri,
                  ContentValues values)
        Override of the insert function of the AbstractProvider class, in a way that it uses the SQLite insertWithOnConflict function that replaces the record when trying to insert insert a duplicate column value
        Parameters:
        uri - Uri
        values - ContentValues
        Returns:
        Uri to the inserted row

      • bulkInsert

        public int bulkInsert(@NonNull
                      Uri uri,
                      @NonNull
                      ContentValues[] values)
        Override the super class bulkinsert method so we can act differently on insert conflicts, notify bound cursor loaders, and we run all the inserts transaction-based, which is much faster
        Parameters:
        uri - the uri (table) to update
        values - the values we want to insert
        Returns:
        amount of records inserted

      • createProjectionMap

        private java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> createProjectionMap(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                                                 java.lang.String columnName,
                                                                                 java.lang.String asColumnName)
        Helper function to create the sql to rename columns using the AS keyword
        Parameters:
        tableName - the table name for the fully qualified column name
        columnName - the original column name
        asColumnName - the name to rename the column
        Returns:
        a hashmap containing only one item with two strings containing the sql to rename
